definition: same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
see 國務院國有資產監督管理委員會|国务院国有资产监督管理委员会[Guo2 wu4 yuan4 Guo2 you3 Zi1 chan3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
evaluation committee/judging panel/judging panel member/adjudicator/abbr. for 評選委員會委員|评选委员会委员[ping2 xuan3 wei3 yuan2 hui4 wei3 yuan2]
Standing Committee of the National People's Congress (abbr. of 全國人民代表大會常務委員會|全国人民代表大会常务委员会)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 Chang2 Wei3 hui4

definition: abbr. for 立法委員會|立法委员会[li4 fa3 wei3 yuan2 hui4]/abbr. for 立法委員|立法委员[li4 fa3 wei3 yuan2]

sentences.english: From grade one, I have been serving as the monitor and school group's committee all the time.
sentences.chinese: 從一年級起，我一直擔任着班長以及學校大隊委。

sentences.english: Seek advice at the same time appoint commissarial number will be flexibility, without limitation of rigid quota of people.
sentences.chinese: 同時諮詢委委員人數將是彈性的，無硬性名額限制。

sentences.english: Athetis lepigone is a new insect pest in seedling stage of summer corn in China, and causes serious damage.
sentences.chinese: 二點委夜蛾是我國夏玉米苗期的新害蟲，危害性極強。

sentences.english: The National Development and Reform Commission shall take the lead in carrying out the inter-departmental coordination mechanism for bidding and tendering.
sentences.chinese: 國家發展改革委爲招標投標部際協調機制牽頭單位。

sentences.english: The violators whom the Federal Election Commission detects may land in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 這些違規的人被聯邦選舉委發現可就麻煩纏身了。

sentences.english: Maybe Lo and Zeng Yang lived a same birthday day.
sentences.chinese: 好像，羅委和曾揚是同一天的生日。

sentences.english: Of interest "transition committee", said the transitional government will soon comment?
sentences.chinese: 對利“過渡委”稱將於近日成立過渡政府有何評論？

sentences.english: Article 3 The National Development and Reform Commission is the examination and approval organ for the registration of price assessors.
sentences.chinese: 第三條國家發展改革委爲價格鑑證師的註冊審批機關。

sentences.english: The Chinese delegation will be headed by chairman of the National Reforms Development Commission (NDRC) Xu Shaoshi.
sentences.chinese: 中國代表團將由國家發展改革委主任徐紹史領銜。

sentences.english: The committee chose students who were perceived to be better matches for Andover's program.
sentences.chinese: 只是招生委選擇了那些跟安多福更適合的學生。

definition: to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join

leading small group (LSG), a CCP body that exercises general oversight on matters relating to a specific area (LSG for foreign affairs 外事工作, LSG for comprehensively deepening reforms 全面深化改革 etc)/aka central leading group
